# referenceRestrictions

**Instance Property**

The restrictions that an asset places on how it resolves references to external media.

## Declaration

```swift
var referenceRestrictions: AVAssetReferenceRestrictions { get }
```

## Discussion

For [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAsset], this property reflects the value passed in for [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAssetReferenceRestrictionsKey], if any.

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetReferenceRestrictions/defaultPolicy]. See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVURLAssetReferenceRestrictionsKey] for more information about reference restrictions.

## Retrieving reference restrictions

- **AVAssetReferenceRestrictions**: Restrictions to use when resolving references to external media data.
